Title: .NET vFaceWall
Description: .NET vFaceWall is autility script written in asp.net which allows developer to build next generation facebook wall style user profiles for asp.net websites.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
.NET vFaceWall utility script and project allow you to build next generation professional facebook wall style content posting and sharing solution within your existing or new asp.net project or website.

It uses latest asp.net and web standards including jquery and twitter bootrap for making next generation user interface.

Features:

  • User registeration and signup process.
  • Auto signup through facebook.
  • Jquery & twitter bootstap compatible user interface
  • Complete script for posting content, comments and perform other actions
  • Control panel for managing users, posts and comments.
  • Advertisement management.
  • Ip block management.
  • Multiple language user interface
  • and other features

For more information visit http://www.mediasoftpro.com/vfacewall/
